abilities.name: Summon Clones
about: Encounter creates a circle of untargetable clones everywhere besides his location, that after a short time dash forward in opposite direction

abilities.name: Enrage
about: Increases movement speed, damage, attack and cast speed

abilities.name: Slash
about: Slashes twice, releasing waves of force that damage enemies they hit. Enemies in the middle of the slashes can be hit by both slashes

abilities.name: Reave
about: Attacks an area in front of encounter in sequence

abilities.name: Charge
about: Charges at player's location. This knocks the encounter back and stuns it. Enemies in the way are pushed to the side. Damage and stun are proportional to distance travelled

abilities.name: Sword Storms
about: Creates a barrage of projectiles in a circle
